title: Save up to a Hundred Bucks on the Sony WF-1000XM5 Earbuds!
description: They're much cheaper thanks to this offer. The post Save up to a Hundred Bucks on the Sony WF-1000XM5 Earbuds! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: They're much cheaper thanks to this offer.
text: If you’re after premium wireless audio hardware, then you might be familiar with headphones like Sony’s ever-popular XM4 and XM5 series, which have set the standards as to what folks can expect from great-sounding audio. With that being said, buyers looking for a more lightweight option might want to try out the WF-1000XM5 Earbuds, which are on sale on Amazon right now. In terms of features, you’re getting up to 8 hours (24-hours with case) battery life, AI based noise reduction algorithm and bone conduction sensor for clear calls, active noise cancellation, and a bit of water resistance making them safe for use in workouts and light rain. They also come with a pretty lightweight design, and support touch controls for easy use – you can check the earbuds using the link below. html:
If you’re after premium wireless audio hardware, then you might be familiar with headphones like Sony’s ever-popular XM4 and XM5 series, which have set the standards as to what folks can expect from great-sounding audio. With that being said, buyers looking for a more lightweight option might want to try out the WF-1000XM5 Earbuds, which are on sale on Amazon right now.

In terms of features, you’re getting up to 8 hours (24-hours with case) battery life, AI based noise reduction algorithm and bone conduction sensor for clear calls, active noise cancellation, and a bit of water resistance making them safe for use in workouts and light rain. They also come with a pretty lightweight design, and support touch controls for easy use – you can check the earbuds using the link below.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
